title: PLAZA / COUPRIS KINEEMA
description:
Lieutenant Kitsuragi's Coupris Kineema. With the built in shortwave radio and a trunk full of goodies, here lies the answer to the question that's been bothering you - what tore me from the soft abyss this morning.

* Gain item: Crowbar
* Gain item: bodybags
* Gain item: Chaincutters
* Gain item: Fire extinguisher
* Gain secret task: Cut something.
* Gain task: Get a Primer-book.

dialogueTree.title: Coupris Kineema: "Inside you see a set of steering le..."
dialogueTree.text: Inside you see a set of steering levers, a radio-microphone, a pull-out toolbox, and the soft glow of the fuel pre-heater gauge.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have something here we could sel..."
links.text: "I have something here we could sell. Look in the back, in the suspect transport enclosure."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Transport enclosure? Regular people..."
links.text: Transport enclosure? Regular people just call it *the cage*.

links.title: You: "Look in the suspect transport enclo..."
links.text: Look in the suspect transport enclosure.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The cage at the back of the motor c..."
links.text: The cage at the back of the motor carriage looks rather uncomfortable. Four shiny hubcaps are stacked against the seat. Their silver edges sparkle in the dark.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I confiscated these four a little..."
links.text: "I confiscated these four a little while back. We can take them to the pawnshop down by the Martinaise Canal."

links.title: You: ""What *are* those things?""
links.text: "What *are* those things?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They're spinner hubcaps -- frivolo..."
links.text: "They're spinner hubcaps -- frivolous things you put on your wheels. When the wheels come to a stop," he makes a spinning motion with his hands, "the caps keep on spinning. There's no real use for them, it's just for vanity."

links.title: Suggestion: "A vanity he wouldn't mind."
links.text: A vanity he wouldn't mind.

links.title: Interfacing: "Honestly, that sounds like an *amaz..."
links.text: Honestly, that sounds like an *amazing* physics demonstration.

links.title: You: ""What do you mean you 'confiscated'..."
links.text: "What do you mean you 'confiscated' them?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A couple weeks ago I stopped a you..."
links.text: "A couple weeks ago I stopped a young man for going slower than the speed of traffic. Turns out he was some Coalition official's son -- and high."

links.title: You: ""So you took his spinners?""
links.text: "So you took his spinners?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm," he nods. "I took them *and*..."
links.text: "Mhm," he nods. "I took them *and* arrested him for driving under the influence."

links.title: You: "(Look at Kim.) "Isn't that *corrupt..."
links.text: (Look at Kim.) "Isn't that *corruption*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know, is it?" The lieutena..."
links.text: "I don't know, is it?" The lieutenant looks back, stone-faced. "I was going to take them into evidence, but they weren't necessary for conviction. He never asked for them back."

links.title: You: "(Look at the spinners.) "I get it,..."
links.text: (Look at the spinners.) "I get it, I would have confiscated them too -- they're mesmerizing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That they are." The lieutenant loo..."
links.text: "That they are." The lieutenant looks at the spinners and sighs. "I was going to take them into evidence, but they weren't necessary for conviction. He never asked for them back."

links.title: You: ""Um.... did you want to put these s..."
links.text: "Um.... did you want to put these spinners on your machine?" (Point at Kineema.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, no. That would be silly. I jus..."
links.text: "No, no. That would be silly. I just..." He hesitates. "I don't know why I kept them. It doesn't matter. I couldn't put them on this MC anyway. A cop with spinners -- that would be outrageous."

links.title: You: ""Yes. Outrageously cool.""
links.text: "Yes. Outrageously cool."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He flashes a smile, barely visible..."
links.text: He flashes a smile, barely visible in the dark.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry you have to sell them be..."
links.text: "I'm sorry you have to sell them because of me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As I said, they're useless anyway...."
links.text: "As I said, they're useless anyway. I should have remembered I have these earlier..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "But thank you."
links.text: But thank you.

links.title: You: ""It's only right that we sell them.""
links.text: "It's only right that we sell them."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't make your unpaid hostel bill..."
links.text: "Don't make your unpaid hostel bill a *moral boon*, officer. It won't stick."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Shot down. I've nothing to add."
links.text: Shot down. I've nothing to add.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""Yes. Too wacky.""
links.text: "Yes. Too wacky."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Exactly.""
links.text: "Exactly."

links.title: You: "Just nod."
links.text: Just nod.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The spinners shine so bright they r..."
links.text: The spinners shine so bright they reflect on the lieutenant's glasses. He doesn't say anything either.

links.title: You: ""You said something about a pawnsho..."
links.text: "You said something about a pawnshop?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, the Bird's Nest Roy, near the..."
links.text: "Yes, the Bird's Nest Roy, near the canal -- we've been there. If I'm not mistaken it should be open late."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "Items that can be pawned at Bird's..."
links.text: Items that can be pawned at Bird's Nest Roy's appear in your INVENTORY, under the ITEMS tab. You can pawn these items when talking to Roy.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, there's one 100 metres south..."
links.text: "Yes, there's one 100 metres south of here, I think it's called Roy's Nest or something. If I'm not mistaken it should be open late."

links.title: You: ""Thanks. I appreciate your help." (..."
links.text: "Thanks. I appreciate your help." (Take the spinners.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods as you take the..."
links.text: The lieutenant nods as you take the spinners.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "In the cabin you see a set of steer..."
links.text: In the cabin you see a set of steering levers, a radio on a hook, a pull-out toolbox and the soft glow of the fuel pre-heater gauge.

links.title: You: ""Sorry, I can't take them. It would..."
links.text: "Sorry, I can't take them. It wouldn't be right." (Don't take the spinners.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right, let's *not* take them n..."
links.text: "All right, let's *not* take them now, then come back once we realize we have to -- have this conversation *again* and then take them."

links.title: Logic: "Sounds likely."
links.text: Sounds likely.

links.title: You: "How do I turn on the headlights?"
links.text: How do I turn on the headlights?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He turns the pre-heater on, waits,..."
links.text: He turns the pre-heater on, waits, takes out his keys and says: "All right. Ready. I turn, you press START -- it's next to the pre-heater."

links.title: Empathy: "He's downplaying his excitement --..."
links.text: He's downplaying his excitement -- the lieutenant is more than happy to show off his precious carriage.

links.title: You: "Press ENGINE START."
links.text: Press ENGINE START.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The dashboard lights up with orange..."
links.text: The dashboard lights up with orange glow. The rounds per minute gauge jumps and the engine of the Coupris Kineema comes to life with a whiny growl.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Like a leopard, waking from its sle..."
links.text: Like a leopard, waking from its sleep. Yawning and roaring at the same time.

links.title: Shivers: "That sound. You feel the wind in yo..."
links.text: That sound. You feel the wind in your hair as if you're already driving -- but where?

links.title: You: "Yes -- where?"
links.text: Yes -- where?

links.title: Shivers: "Down a narrow street lined with sha..."
links.text: Down a narrow street lined with shabby wooden houses, the 8/81 motor-tract coiling like a serpent high above. Children play under the viaduct. Eyes turn to watch you as you pass...

links.title: You: "What's ahead?"
links.text: What's ahead?

links.title: Shivers: "The Valley of Dogs -- and before it..."
links.text: The Valley of Dogs -- and before it, a familiar dome, like a ladybug without the colours. The building has a designated parking place for *your* carriage.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "This is Precinct 41 -- as close as..."
links.text: This is Precinct 41 -- as close as you have to home now. It's far away...

links.title: You: "Press the button labelled HEADLIGHT..."
links.text: Press the button labelled HEADLIGHTS.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The lights unfold with a little cli..."
links.text: The lights unfold with a little click, casting electrical light onto the ground before the vehicle.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There you go. I'll turn them off f..."
links.text: "There you go. I'll turn them off from the remote once you're done -- we just need to stand in front of the machine now."

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "Uhm... When Lieutenant Kitsuragi is..."
links.text: Uhm... When Lieutenant Kitsuragi is here? It's his MC.

links.title: Interfacing: "You need his key to turn on the eng..."
links.text: You need his key to turn on the engine if you want the foldable lights to pop up.

links.title: You: "Pick up the radio."
links.text: Pick up the radio.

links.title: Alice: ""This is Precinct 57," the operator..."
links.text: "This is Precinct 57," the operator greets you through the static. "How may I assist you?"

links.title: You: ""I'm ready to try dialing Speedreak..."
links.text: "I'm ready to try dialing Speedreaks FM again."

links.title: Alice: ""Okay, officer. One moment.""
links.text: "Okay, officer. One moment."

links.title: You: ""Excited, Kim?""
links.text: "Excited, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Alice: ""I have *DJ Mesh* on the line. I'll..."
links.text: "I have *DJ Mesh* on the line. I'll connect you now."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Yo!" The word shoots out of the ma..."
links.text: "Yo!" The word shoots out of the man's mouth like a bullet.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The starting gun fires. And we're o..."
links.text: The starting gun fires. And we're off!

links.title: You: ""Yo yo!""
links.text: "Yo yo!"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Yo yo yo! You got DJ Mesh here, my..."
links.text: "Yo yo yo! You got DJ Mesh here, my man. I got a few minutes before I gotta go back on air. What do you need?"

links.title: You: ""I'm just calling to confirm -- did..."
links.text: "I'm just calling to confirm -- did you debut a new track from DJ Flacio a few days ago?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""'An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (A..."
links.text: "'An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (And I'm Puking).'"

links.title: Conceptualization: "That's the name of the song. Vulgar..."
links.text: That's the name of the song. Vulgarity is la belle du jour.

links.title: You: ""Great title, man! Number one stuff.""
links.text: "Great title, man! Number one stuff."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Thank you very much! Yeah, it's th..."
links.text: "Thank you very much! Yeah, it's the shit-hot new single from DJ Flacio. Really shredding up the sonic waves."

links.title: You: ""I'm guessing that's the song.""
links.text: "I'm guessing that's the song."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""It ain't just a song! It's the shi..."
links.text: "It ain't just a song! It's the shit-hot new single from DJ Flacio that's shredding up the sonic waves."

links.title: You: ""... What?""
links.text: "... What?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""'An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (A..."
links.text: "'An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (And I'm Puking),'" he says more slowly.

links.title: You: ""An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (An..."
links.text: "An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (And I'm Puking)?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (An..."
links.text: "An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (And I'm Puking)!"

links.title: You: ""Okay... But what is the song calle..."
links.text: "Okay... But what is the song called?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Yeah, that is the song. 'An Asshol..."
links.text: "Yeah, that is the song. 'An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (And I'm Puking).'"

links.title: You: ""Are you insulting an officer of th..."
links.text: "Are you insulting an officer of the Law, punk?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""What? No, I'm not telling you off,..."
links.text: "What? No, I'm not telling you off, man. That's the name of the song! 'An Asshole Is A Mouth For Shit (And I'm Puking).'"

links.title: You: ""The Lamb is calm before its slaugh..."
links.text: "The Lamb is calm before its slaughter. It does not know what will befall it."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Uh... What?" He laughs, confused...."
links.text: "Uh... What?" He laughs, confused. "That's the wildest shit I heard today. You are a cop, right?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. And I have a question.""
links.text: "Yes. And I have a question."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""You aren't the only one. Anyway, I..."
links.text: "You aren't the only one. Anyway, I only got a few minutes before I gotta go back on air. What can DJ Mesh tell the RCM?"

links.title: You: ""I'm so sorry to bother you. I just..."
links.text: "I'm so sorry to bother you. I just have a question."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Ain't a bother, brother. Anyway, I..."
links.text: "Ain't a bother, brother. Anyway, I only got a few minutes before I gotta go back on air. What do you need?"

links.title: You: ""Hello, is this DJ Mesh?""
links.text: "Hello, is this DJ Mesh?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""It is. I got a few minutes before..."
links.text: "It is. I got a few minutes before I gotta go back on air. What can I do for you, cop-man?"

links.title: Alice: ""Sorry, officer. Your radio persona..."
links.text: "Sorry, officer. Your radio personalities are unavailable, probably until tomorrow. Is there anything else I can assist you with?"

links.title: You: ""Alice, I need you to connect me to..."
links.text: "Alice, I need you to connect me to Speedfreaks FM."

links.title: Alice: ""Come again, officer?""
links.text: "Come again, officer?"

links.title: You: ""I said 'Speedfreaks FM'. Kim's a b..."
links.text: "I said 'Speedfreaks FM'. Kim's a big fan."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs under his brea..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs under his breath.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""Really?" he says, low and tired."
links.text: "Really?" he says, low and tired.

links.title: Alice: ""Right... One moment, officer.""
links.text: "Right... One moment, officer."

links.title: You: ""Speedfreaks FM. A radio station. I..."
links.text: "Speedfreaks FM. A radio station. It's for the case."

links.title: You: ""Precinct 57, we've been attacked...."
links.text: "Precinct 57, we've been attacked. I repeat -- Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi and..."

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "Something is wrong. Only static his..."
links.text: Something is wrong. Only static hisses through the speaker.

links.title: You: ""Hello?""
links.text: "Hello?"

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "No reply. Only the mindless drone o..."
links.text: No reply. Only the mindless drone of static, crawling through the air.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been this way for a while now..."
links.text: "It's been this way for a while now." The lieutenant shrugs. "My guess is, the Union is listening in on our conversations -- and jamming outward communications to protect themselves from Krenel."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It only happens when someone menti..."
links.text: "It only happens when someone mentions the attack -- the rest is unaffected. Our best bet is to carry on like nothing happened -- that is, if we don't want us cut off the grid completely."

links.title: You: ""Isn't that dangerous?""
links.text: "Isn't that dangerous?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No more dangerous than stepping be..."
links.text: "No more dangerous than stepping between three armed mercenaries and eight Union men, I hope." He glances over his shoulder.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't like it either, but that's..."
links.text: "I don't like it either, but that's the way it is. The streets seem safe enough to me. If anything, taking out the mercs made things calmer. For now..." He flicks off the radio. Silence.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You can try calling again -- just..."
links.text: "You can try calling again -- just don't mention the tribunal. And remember, they're listening in."

links.title: Half Light: "They're shutting you up. Silencing..."
links.text: They're shutting you up. Silencing you. Don't fucking drop your guard.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Everything sounds okay. No drumbeat..."
links.text: Everything sounds okay. No drumbeat of total war yet. If anything, everything sounds *too* okay...

links.title: You: ""Okay." (Turn off the radio.)"
links.text: "Okay." (Turn off the radio.)

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "Silence."
links.text: Silence.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "If only Lieutenant Kitsuragi were h..."
links.text: If only Lieutenant Kitsuragi were here to make sense of it...

links.title: You: "Turn off the radio."
links.text: Turn off the radio.

links.title: You: ""Could you connect me to the 41st P..."
links.text: "Could you connect me to the 41st Precinct? I have something I need to report."

links.title: You: ""Come in dispatch, come in dispatch!""
links.text: "Come in dispatch, come in dispatch!"

links.title: Alice: ""This is Officer Alice DeMettrie, P..."
links.text: "This is Officer Alice DeMettrie, Precinct 57. How may I assist you?" You could swear she was friendlier with the lieutenant.

links.title: Interfacing: "Under the green PRIMELINE a yellow..."
links.text: Under the green PRIMELINE a yellow SAVED button catches your eye... You wonder what the lieutenant's default radio station is?

links.title: Alice: ""This is Officer Alice DeMettrie, P..."
links.text: "This is Officer Alice DeMettrie, Precinct 57. How may I assist you?" a voice replies in the radio.

links.title: You: ""Alice this is Firewalker. Re-conne..."
links.text: "Alice this is Firewalker. Re-connect me to the 41st."

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "In the cabin you see a set of steer..."
links.text: In the cabin you see a set of steering levers, a radio on a hook, a pull-out toolbox and the soft glow of the fuel pre-heater gauge.

links.title: You: ""Alice, please connect me to the 41..."
links.text: "Alice, please connect me to the 41st again."

links.title: You: ""I was told I need to connect to my..."
links.text: "I was told I need to connect to my station... the 41st lazareth."

links.title: You: ""Is that legal to play?""
links.text: "Is that legal to play?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""It's illegal not to play, man. Whe..."
links.text: "It's illegal not to play, man. When you got that kind of music in you, the universe demands you let it out, know what I mean?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Plus, Flacio and I got it in our c..."
links.text: "Plus, Flacio and I got it in our contracts that we could play our own tracks. So really, it would be illegal not to."

links.title: You: ""Do people like it?""
links.text: "Do people like it?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""They're lovin' it, man! The reques..."
links.text: "They're lovin' it, man! The requests keep coming in for more."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""I really think it's the future of..."
links.text: "I really think it's the future of music, I do. Fuckin', like, stinkcore, or something. Shit's so nasty, those stinkwaves come up like soundwaves, you know what I mean?"

links.title: Logic: "This is preposterous. Neither sound..."
links.text: This is preposterous. Neither sound nor scent work anything as he's describing. What does he even *mean*?

links.title: You: ""Sure, man. I'm young, cool, and wi..."
links.text: "Sure, man. I'm young, cool, and with it."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Very cool, man, I'm dead serious w..."
links.text: "Very cool, man, I'm dead serious when I say, Flacio is going to make it big in this world."

links.title: You: ""I don't have any idea what you mea..."
links.text: "I don't have any idea what you mean."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Doesn't matter. Listen, I'm dead s..."
links.text: "Doesn't matter. Listen, I'm dead serious when I say, Flacio is going to make it big in this world."

links.title: You: ""Okay. Let's move on. We talked to..."
links.text: "Okay. Let's move on. We talked to some kids who said they heard it in their heads. Do you know how that could be possible?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: "He sighs. "Is that what this is abo..."
links.text: He sighs. "Is that what this is about? Listen, it's not our problem if kids decide to tune into R-R-R-Revachol's hottest station."

links.title: You: ""It's not that they played it on a..."
links.text: "It's not that they played it on a radio. They heard it in their heads. Do you know how that's possible?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""I don't understand. Are you asking..."
links.text: "I don't understand. Are you asking if we can, like, play our station into people's brains?"

links.title: You: ""Sure! Forced radio. Can't tune out..."
links.text: "Sure! Forced radio. Can't tune out. You'd make a killing on ads!"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Speedfreaks FM is elective listeni..."
links.text: "Speedfreaks FM is elective listening, man. We don't want to force the people to adopt our thinking. That's fascist bullshit."

links.title: You: ""No, I was just asking -- and dream..."
links.text: "No, I was just asking -- and dreaming up a bold new money making scheme."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Right, well -- no, we don't force..."
links.text: "Right, well -- no, we don't force radio into peoples heads. Don't know how you'd even do that, man."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Was there anything else you need t..."
links.text: "Was there anything else you need to know?"

links.title: You: ""No, that wasn't my fascist line, t..."
links.text: "No, that wasn't my fascist line, that was my ultraliberal one. I can do the fascist one if you want."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""You're a fucking wild man. Sure, l..."
links.text: "You're a fucking wild man. Sure, let's hear it."

links.title: You: ""Okay, the fascist thing was me cal..."
links.text: "Okay, the fascist thing was me calling you an enemy of the state for force-pumping filth into children, thus corrupting traditional values."

links.title: DJ Mesh: "The radio host doesn't try to conta..."
links.text: The radio host doesn't try to contain his laughter. "Oh, man, I love it! You're great. No, we didn't do anything like that. Wouldn't know how to -- we just played it on air like normal people."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Now, was there anything else you w..."
links.text: "Now, was there anything else you wanted to ask?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah. Like a new way to equalize p..."
links.text: "Yeah. Like a new way to equalize people, getting them all on the same station. A great tool for Communism."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Right on, brother. We gotta make s..."
links.text: "Right on, brother. We gotta make sure everybody tunes into this sonic revolution!"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""But we didn't, like, force it into..."
links.text: "But we didn't, like, force it into people's brains. Got no idea how to do that, short of them just tuning in on their favourite radio receiving device."

links.title: You: ""Okay. I'd recommend looking into i..."
links.text: "Okay. I'd recommend looking into it, though. For the revolution."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Revolution-brain-broadcast. Got it..."
links.text: "Revolution-brain-broadcast. Got it. Yeah, we'll look into it."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."
links.text: "Was there anything else you wanted to ask?"

links.title: You: ""I understand. Thank you for cleari..."
links.text: "I understand. Thank you for clearing that up."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""My pleasure, comrade cop. Is there..."
links.text: "My pleasure, comrade cop. Is there anything else you needed?"

links.title: You: ""Exactly like that. Because I think..."
links.text: "Exactly like that. Because I think you're an enemy of traditional values forcing your filth on the innocent."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Shit keeps getting weirder with yo..."
links.text: "Shit keeps getting weirder with you, man. Fucking unbelievable."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""No, we didn't force radio into peo..."
links.text: "No, we didn't force radio into people's heads. The fuck is it with you fascists and conspiracy theories?"

links.title: Endurance: "Tell him the truth, brther. Even i..."
links.text: Tell him the truth, brther. Even if he isn't *hard* enough to hear it.

links.title: You: ""I'm just thinking of the children.""
links.text: "I'm just thinking of the children."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Right. Is there anything else you..."
links.text: "Right. Is there anything else you need, or can I hang up the fucking phone now?"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""It's not a conspiracy theory, it's..."
links.text: "It's not a conspiracy theory, it's logic. The lesser races, still fresh and DRIPPING from the proto-slime, can't beat us outright -- so they resort to impossibly devious schemes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant stares at you, his j..."
links.text: The lieutenant stares at you, his jaw clenched. A vein strains on his temple.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""You know, it'd be one thing if you..."
links.text: "You know, it'd be one thing if you were just crazy. Like, I could forgive you then. I know lots of crazy people."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""But you're just fucking hateful. A..."
links.text: "But you're just fucking hateful. And I got no time for that shit. Anything else you need, or can I hang up?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, like that. Maybe it was part..."
links.text: "Yeah, like that. Maybe it was part of your civic duty, you were just testing it out for the government."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""We ain't testing anything out for..."
links.text: "We ain't testing anything out for the Man, unless it's how many bricks you need to break all of his windows."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""That wasn't a threat, by the way...."
links.text: "That wasn't a threat, by the way. Just a figure of speech, I'm a spoken word guy. Now, is there anything else you needed?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Merchandise. Ask for Speedfreaks FM..."
links.text: Merchandise. Ask for Speedfreaks FM merchandise.

links.title: You: ""Wait! Can you send me any Speedfre..."
links.text: "Wait! Can you send me any Speedfreaks merch?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""I can understand why you'd ask, ou..."
links.text: "I can understand why you'd ask, our shit's hot. Think we gave the last of it away at our last live show, but -- what's your address anyway?"

links.title: You: ""I'm staying in a shack by the coas..."
links.text: "I'm staying in a shack by the coast, in a small fishing village near Martinaise."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Uh, I'm gonna need better than 'st..."
links.text: "Uh, I'm gonna need better than 'streetless shack' if you can get that for me."

links.title: You: ""Send it to the Whirling-in-Rags, i..."
links.text: "Send it to the Whirling-in-Rags, in Martinaise."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""That I can do. Whirling-in-Rags, M..."
links.text: "That I can do. Whirling-in-Rags, Martinaise. Got it."

links.title: Logic: "Even if a package arrives, how will..."
links.text: Even if a package arrives, how will it get to you if it hasn't got your name on it?

links.title: You: ""Wait! Don't you need to know my na..."
links.text: "Wait! Don't you need to know my name?"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""I don't want to know, man. I like..."
links.text: "I don't want to know, man. I like leaving it to the imagination. Now, anything else?"

links.title: You: ""Thank you!""
links.text: "Thank you!"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Hey, don't thank me yet! Again, I..."
links.text: "Hey, don't thank me yet! Again, I don't think we got anything left, but, well... Anything else?"

links.title: You: ""I don't really know my address...""
links.text: "I don't really know my address..."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""That's, uh... Well, have you got *..."
links.text: "That's, uh... Well, have you got *any* address I can send shit to, man?"

links.title: You: ""No, that was it. Thank you for you..."
links.text: "No, that was it. Thank you for your time."

links.title: DJ Mesh: "No parting words; only the dull cry..."
links.text: No parting words; only the dull cry of the dial tone.

links.title: Alice: ""The party has terminated the call...."
links.text: "The party has terminated the call. Is there anything else I can do for you, officer?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You should check the radio again!"
links.text: You should check the radio again!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You should check the radio!"
links.text: You should check the radio!

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Nah, man, thank you. This has been..."
links.text: "Nah, man, thank you. This has been an absolute pleasure."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Later, cop-man.""
links.text: "Later, cop-man."

links.title: You: ""Just one more thing -- give a shou..."
links.text: "Just one more thing -- give a shoutout Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi. He *coincidentally* has you saved to his radio."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Not going to happen, you fascist p..."
links.text: "Not going to happen, you fascist prick. Tell your friend to not listen to us any more."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's breath catches in..."
links.text: The lieutenant's breath catches in his chest.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You crossed a line. This will not b..."
links.text: You crossed a line. This will not be forgotten.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Not going to happen, you fascist p..."
links.text: "Not going to happen, you fascist prick."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Huh?" The sound bubbles out of him..."
links.text: "Huh?" The sound bubbles out of him, even to his own surprise.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Look at that! His eyes dilate. That..."
links.text: Look at that! His eyes dilate. That's joy, my man. You wouldn't be able to tell, but his glasses *just* magnify it.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""Okay, cop-man! Can do, will do!""
links.text: "Okay, cop-man! Can do, will do!"

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""DJ Mesh out.""
links.text: "DJ Mesh out."

links.title: You: ""I need you to connect me to a civi..."
links.text: "I need you to connect me to a civilian -- a Sylvie. She may have reported a murder."

links.title: Alice: ""Of course. What is her number, off..."
links.text: "Of course. What is her number, officer?"

links.title: You: ""Kim, didn't Garte give you Sylvie'..."
links.text: "Kim, didn't Garte give you Sylvie's number?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, hold on..." the lieutenant ta..."
links.text: "Yes, hold on..." the lieutenant takes a look at his notes. "Her number is 005 1944 298."

links.title: Alice: ""Received. Hold on, officer.""
links.text: "Received. Hold on, officer."

links.title: You: "Wait patiently."
links.text: Wait patiently.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi slowly begins..."
links.text: Lieutenant Kitsuragi slowly begins to tap a little rhythm with his right foot. Quite a lot of time has passed.

links.title: Alice: ""Officer," she finally returns. "I..."
links.text: "Officer," she finally returns. "I have Sylvie Malaika on the line for you."

links.title: Sylvie: ""Yes, hello!" A female voice greets..."
links.text: "Yes, hello!" A female voice greets you through static -- it sounds like she's million miles away from here.

links.title: You: "Start slapping a marching rhythm on..."
links.text: Start slapping a marching rhythm on your thighs.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Give it a minute, she might be bus..."
links.text: "Give it a minute, she might be busy at the moment... takes a bit to get to the phone."

links.title: Volition: "Just wait. Relax."
links.text: Just wait. Relax.

links.title: You: ""Change of plans, Alice -- connect..."
links.text: "Change of plans, Alice -- connect me to *you*."

links.title: Alice: ""What do you mean, officer? I'm not..."
links.text: "What do you mean, officer? I'm not Sylvie."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Oh, did you hear that? How she said..."
links.text: Oh, did you hear that? How she said 'officer'?! She's a wild one, wants it bad, bratan. Get that party going!

links.title: You: "Hold on! As a feminist I find these..."
links.text: Hold on! As a feminist I find these implications offensive.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Offensive-smoffensive, just ask her..."
links.text: Offensive-smoffensive, just ask her, alright!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "As your parasympathetic nervous sys..."
links.text: As your parasympathetic nervous system I call bullshit. Now ask her!

links.title: You: "Wait, what? 'Wild one'? That doesn'..."
links.text: Wait, what? 'Wild one'? That doesn't sound right...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "C'mon, wake up! The way she said sh..."
links.text: C'mon, wake up! The way she said she's not Sylvie -- practically begging you to make a move. Just go for it.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Yeah, bratan, otherwise you're alwa..."
links.text: Yeah, bratan, otherwise you're always gonna be wondering what could've been. Just ask her!

links.title: You: ""Do you like to party, Alice?""
links.text: "Do you like to party, Alice?"

links.title: Alice: ""Sir, you're already connected to t..."
links.text: "Sir, you're already connected to the 57th Precinct." Her voice is sharp and noticeably less friendly.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "What an unbelievable prude... Oh we..."
links.text: What an unbelievable prude... Oh well, at least now you know.

links.title: Alice: ""Sir, how can I help you with your..."
links.text: "Sir, how can I help you with your *investigation*?" The voice on the other end is becoming impatient.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Odd... she didn't sound menopausal...."
links.text: Odd... she didn't sound menopausal. Must be frigid or something. Oh well.

links.title: You: ""I don't know, Alice... just connec..."
links.text: "I don't know, Alice... just connect me."

links.title: Alice: ""Sir, you're already connected to t..."
links.text: "Sir, you're already connected to the 57th Precinct." Her voice is sharp.

links.title: Alice: ""Now, how can I help you in your *i..."
links.text: "Now, how can I help you in your *investigation*?"

links.title: Suggestion: "What is *wrong* with you? Why did y..."
links.text: What is *wrong* with you? Why did you ask to be connected to her? Who *does* that?! Act professional now.

links.title: Volition: "*You* told him to do that stupid th..."
links.text: *You* told him to do that stupid thing...

links.title: You: ""I feel deprived of human contact.""
links.text: "I feel deprived of human contact."

links.title: Alice: ""Who doesn't," she states matter of..."
links.text: "Who doesn't," she states matter of factly. "Now, how can I help you in your *investigation*?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Oh, did you hear that? Pure lust. S..."
links.text: Oh, did you hear that? Pure lust. She's a wild one! Throw her a curve-ball, see if she's down to party.

links.title: You: ""Actually, let's not do that right..."
links.text: "Actually, let's not do that right now." (Back.)

links.title: Alice: ""Officer?" You hear phones ringing..."
links.text: "Officer?" You hear phones ringing and people talking in the background.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Change of plans -- *her* number."
links.text: Change of plans -- *her* number.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Damn it -- the lieutenant had the n..."
links.text: Damn it -- the lieutenant had the number and he's not here.

links.title: You: ""Please connect me to Sylvie again.""
links.text: "Please connect me to Sylvie again."

links.title: Alice: ""Just a second, officer...""
links.text: "Just a second, officer..."

links.title: Alice: ""Sylvie Malaika on the line for yo..."
links.text: "Sylvie Malaika on the line for you, officer."

links.title: Sylvie: ""Yes, hello." You recognize her voi..."
links.text: "Yes, hello." You recognize her voice.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "That quickfire patter -- is this th..."
links.text: That quickfire patter -- is this the voice the twins heard?

links.title: DJ Flacio: ""... AND NOW FOR SOME MUSIC!" anoth..."
links.text: "... AND NOW FOR SOME MUSIC!" another voice screams into the microphone. Rhythmic rock music fills the cabin, as the back-to-back DJs mix it with sounds from car crashes and illegal speeding competitions.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Turn it off, this isn't music!"
links.text: Turn it off, this isn't music!

links.title: Conceptualization: "This is art... *underground* art......"
links.text: This is art... *underground* art... a *scene*.

links.title: Half Light: "The entirety of Martinaise is watch..."
links.text: The entirety of Martinaise is watching you!

links.title: You: "Turn the radio back to PRIMELINE."
links.text: Turn the radio back to PRIMELINE.

links.title: You: ""Connect me to Jamrock Public Libra..."
links.text: "Connect me to Jamrock Public Library."

links.title: Alice: ""Hold on, officer.""
links.text: "Hold on, officer."

links.title: Alice: ""I've got Central Jamrock Public Li..."
links.text: "I've got Central Jamrock Public Library on the line and I've already introduced you to their librarian. Connecting the call in 2... 1..."

links.title: Jamrock Public Library: ""Yes, this is Central Jamrock Publi..."
links.text: "Yes, this is Central Jamrock Public Library here." A male librarian answers the call. "How can I help you, officer?"

links.title: Empathy: "He sounds worried, yet ready to ass..."
links.text: He sounds worried, yet ready to assist. This is how people get when the police call.

links.title: Alice: ""I'm afraid they're closed. It says..."
links.text: "I'm afraid they're closed. It says here that the library is open from 10 AM to 6 PM."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should try again during busines..."
links.text: "We should try again during business hours."

links.title: Alice: ""Anything else, detective?""
links.text: "Anything else, detective?"

links.title: You: ""I need to report a dead body on th..."
links.text: "I need to report a dead body on the Martinaise boardwalk."

links.title: You: ""He's investigating a lead on his o..."
links.text: "He's investigating a lead on his own. Listen, I need help."

links.title: Alice: ""Why aren't you using your own radi..."
links.text: "Why aren't you using your own radio to contact your precinct?"

links.title: You: ""That's one of the things I may nee..."
links.text: "That's one of the things I may need help with." (Cough.)

links.title: Alice: ""A-ha. Sounds like trouble." She se..."
links.text: "A-ha. Sounds like trouble." She seems to sigh. "Alright. Next time, have Lieutenant Kitsuragi with you."

links.title: Alice: ""I'll contact him later for a full..."
links.text: "I'll contact him later for a full report." Her voice hasn't become any friendlier. "For now, I'm Officer Alice de Mettrie, how can I help you?"

links.title: You: ""Reasons... uh, for one, I don't kn..."
links.text: "Reasons... uh, for one, I don't know where my radio is."

links.title: Alice: ""That is a pretty big problem, yes...."
links.text: "That is a pretty big problem, yes." She seems to sigh. "Alright. Next time, have Lieutenant Kitsuragi with you."

links.title: You: ""It's a long story. Bad shit has go..."
links.text: "It's a long story. Bad shit has gone down."

links.title: Alice: "There's a pause. "Alright. Next tim..."
links.text: There's a pause. "Alright. Next time, have Lieutenant Kitsuragi with you."

links.title: You: ""Did you find out more about the ow..."
links.text: "Did you find out more about the owner of the armoured boots?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right." A vainglorious smil..."
links.text: "You're right." A vainglorious smile spreads over his face as he pats his machine. "I didn't take you for a motorcar enthusiast. Do you also like TipTop, detective?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The TipTop Tourne is an interisola..."
links.text: The TipTop Tourne is an interisolary racing series, mostly known for its high speeds, ludicrous sponsorship deals, and high death toll. In Revachol it's held quadrennially on the prestigious Zro Carrousel racing circuit.

links.title: You: ""TipTop? Adore it!""
links.text: "TipTop? Adore it!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really?" the lieutenant looks at y..."
links.text: "Really?" the lieutenant looks at you. "Well, I'm not indifferent on the matter either." He adjusts his glasses, visibly pleased to have found a fellow fan.

links.title: You: ""No, I don't care about motorcars,..."
links.text: "No, I don't care about motorcars, I just know about random things."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh." He looks visibly disappointed..."
links.text: "Oh." He looks visibly disappointed. "I guess it's not for everyone."

links.title: You: ""What's TipTop?""
links.text: "What's TipTop?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""An interisolary racing series. You..."
links.text: "An interisolary racing series. You should definitely give it a go if you like motor carriages -- it has fantastic competition." He smiles again.

links.title: You: ""I'm pretty sure I like neither mot..."
links.text: "I'm pretty sure I like neither motorcars or any 'TipTops'."

links.title: You: ""Have you heard back from the ICP a..."
links.text: "Have you heard back from the ICP about the serial number?"

links.title: You: ""Could you run a serial number from..."
links.text: "Could you run a serial number from a pair of armoured boots for me?"

links.title: You: "Press the button labelled "Saved" a..."
links.text: Press the button labelled "Saved" and turn on Speedfreaks FM.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""FASCIST PIGS, I SWEAR. YOU AND KIM..."
links.text: "FASCIST PIGS, I SWEAR. YOU AND KIM KITSURAGI SHOULD ALL..." The assault gives way to burning quiet.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant snaps off the radio,..."
links.text: The lieutenant snaps off the radio, turning it back to PRIMELINE. He stares at you silently.

links.title: Alice: ""This is Precinct 57. Can I connect..."
links.text: "This is Precinct 57. Can I connect you to someone?" The voice on the shortwave repeats.

links.title: DJ Flacio: "Another equally furious voice seize..."
links.text: Another equally furious voice seizes on the silence. "HERE'S SOME MUSIC."

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "An audio-assault descends full forc..."
links.text: An audio-assault descends full force on you. Sonic daggers fly forth from the Kineema's speakers. The soundwaves would slice you if they could.

links.title: You: "Turn the radio back to PRIMELINE."
links.text: Turn the radio back to PRIMELINE.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""...SPOKE TO THE W-W-WILDEST COP IN..."
links.text: "...SPOKE TO THE W-W-WILDEST COP IN REVACHOL. HE ASKED US TO GIVE HIS BUDDY COP, LONG TIME LISTENER KIM KITSURAGI, A BIG SHOUTOUT. KIM, WE LOVE YOU."

links.title: DJ Flacio: ""KEEP IT FREAKY," another voice cut..."
links.text: "KEEP IT FREAKY," another voice cuts in, "LIKE DJ MESH, DJ FLACIO, AND YOUR W-W-W-WILD FRIEND. THIS ONE'S FOR YOU!"

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "If, when a motor-carriage's engine..."
links.text: If, when a motor-carriage's engine was ignited, it could drive by its own accord off to a high mountain and there write a song -- perhaps it'd be something like what you're hearing now.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We aren't discussing this." After..."
links.text: "We aren't discussing this." After a few bars, the lieutenant turns the radio back to PRIMELINE.

links.title: Composure: "What a reserve of willpower. It's t..."
links.text: What a reserve of willpower. It's taking all he's got to not smile.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Elsewhere in Revachol, the lieutena..."
links.text: Elsewhere in Revachol, the lieutenant has also just turned on the radio. In his privacy, he doesn't even try to stop himself from smiling.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""FASCIST PIGS, I SWEAR. YOU SHOULD..."
links.text: "FASCIST PIGS, I SWEAR. YOU SHOULD ALL..." The assault gives way to burning quiet.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant snaps off the radio,..."
links.text: The lieutenant snaps off the radio, turning it back to PRIMELINE. He stares at you silently.

links.title: DJ Flacio: "Another equally furious voice seize..."
links.text: Another equally furious voice seizes on the silence. "HERE'S SOME MUSIC."

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "An audio-assault descends full forc..."
links.text: An audio-assault descends full force on you. Sonic daggers fly forth from the Kineema's speakers. The soundwaves would slice you if they could.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""...SPOKE TO THE W-W-WILDEST COP IN..."
links.text: "...SPOKE TO THE W-W-WILDEST COP IN REVACHOL."

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""DIDN'T EVEN GET HIS NAME. BUT WHOE..."
links.text: "DIDN'T EVEN GET HIS NAME. BUT WHOEVER THAT MYSTERY COP WAS, WE SALUTE HIM."

links.title: DJ Flacio: ""I HOPE HE'S R-R-R-ROCKING WITH US..."
links.text: "I HOPE HE'S R-R-R-ROCKING WITH US A LONG TIME," another voice cuts in. "THE WORLD NEEDS MORE FREAKS. THIS ONE'S FOR YOU, MYSTERY COP!"

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "It requires no adjustment. The radi..."
links.text: It requires no adjustment. The radio is already set to Speedfreaks FM.

links.title: You: "Ignore Alice and press the button l..."
links.text: Ignore Alice and press the button labelled "Saved".

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""...AS ALWAYS IT'S DJS MESH AND FLA..."
links.text: "...AS ALWAYS IT'S DJS MESH AND FLACIO AND YOU'RE LISTENING TO S-S-S-SSS-SSSPEE-EED FREAKS FM, BRINGING YOU THE HOTTEST, THE NASTIEST, THE MOST VULGAR..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A flock of seagulls takes off nearb..."
links.text: A flock of seagulls takes off nearby, startled by the roaring radio.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Right away the lieutenant reaches i..."
links.text: Right away the lieutenant reaches into the cabin and turns off the radio. He's not looking at you as he says:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone must have been messing wit..."
links.text: "Someone must have been messing with the radio, or maybe it picked up a random frequency... You wanted the primeline, right?"

links.title: Empathy: "He's still avoiding your gaze -- an..."
links.text: He's still avoiding your gaze -- and his ears glow red.

links.title: You: ""That's DJ Mesh! That was Speedfrea..."
links.text: "That's DJ Mesh! That was Speedfreaks FM!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is resolutely silent..."
links.text: The lieutenant is resolutely silent. Staring at the console.

links.title: Drama: "A look of betrayal. The secret has..."
links.text: A look of betrayal. The secret has been revealed!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Go for it -- turn the radio back on..."
links.text: Go for it -- turn the radio back on while it's still on the Speedfreaks FM!

links.title: You: ""Aw, man! You should have told me y..."
links.text: "Aw, man! You should have told me you liked them! I could have asked for a shoutout."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't listen to them," the lieut..."
links.text: "I don't listen to them," the lieutenant says sharply.

links.title: You: ""It's okay to like what you like, K..."
links.text: "It's okay to like what you like, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't like it." He shrugs very s..."
links.text: "I don't like it." He shrugs very slightly. "I don't know how that channel got marked."

links.title: Composure: "He's too stiff. Like a grunt during..."
links.text: He's too stiff. Like a grunt during a military inspection, hoping their commanding officer overlooks them.

links.title: Half Light: "Why the fuck can't he just admit it..."
links.text: Why the fuck can't he just admit it? Don't let this go. Hound him until he admits it.

links.title: Volition: "Just leave it alone. He clearly doe..."
links.text: Just leave it alone. He clearly doesn't want to share this with you.

links.title: You: ""You lying to me right now, Kim?""
links.text: "You lying to me right now, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me?""
links.text: "Excuse me?"

links.title: You: ""C'mon, man! You can tell me!""
links.text: "C'mon, man! You can tell me!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises an eyebrow. T..."
links.text: The lieutenant raises an eyebrow. The ocean wind blows, bringing in the smell of salt.

links.title: Authority: "That eyebrow! He's using his Author..."
links.text: That eyebrow! He's using his Authority against you... you... can't resist...

links.title: You: ""I... gah..." (Grab your head.) "I'..."
links.text: "I... gah..." (Grab your head.) "I'm... sorry, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He remains silent."
links.text: He remains silent.

links.title: Authority: "This has gone far enough. You're go..."
links.text: This has gone far enough. You're going to show dignity toward your fellow officer and *apologize*.

links.title: You: ""I said, are you fucking lying to m..."
links.text: "I said, are you fucking lying to me?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing. Never mind.""
links.text: "Nothing. Never mind."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." The lieutenant frowns at you..."
links.text: "Mhm." The lieutenant frowns at you.

links.title: You: "Pick up the radio again."
links.text: Pick up the radio again.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""...SSSSOUPED UP MOTOR CARRIAGE FOR..."
links.text: "...SSSSOUPED UP MOTOR CARRIAGE FOR ONE BAD BAD MOMMA'S BOY, F-F-F-FFFOR THE H-H-HEAVY OF F-F-F-FFFOOT AND FREAKY IN..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""God-damn-it!" The lieutenant moves..."
links.text: "God-damn-it!" The lieutenant moves quick as a viper as he switches off the radio and sets it on primeline. Then he turns to you:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Look, it helps me to stay alert on..."
links.text: "Look, it helps me to stay alert on long nights, okay? It's a method. I'm not some kind of *speed-freak* or..." He shakes his head, furiously staring at his feet.

links.title: You: ""What about *heavy of foot*?""
links.text: "What about *heavy of foot*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You would be too if you had this m..."
links.text: "You would be too if you had this motor carriage," he snaps half-seriously.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But seriously, let's quit joking a..."
links.text: "But seriously, let's quit joking around, alright? We have a case to investigate." He turns back to the cabin.

links.title: You: ""Sure, you don't have to explain yo..."
links.text: "Sure, you don't have to explain yourself. I'll just forget about it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you." His eyes glide over th..."
links.text: "Thank you." His eyes glide over the plaza, making sure that no one heard the sudden blast from the radio, before he turns back to the cabin.

links.title: You: ""Right, you don't want to get into..."
links.text: "Right, you don't want to get into this, no problem."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing to *get into* really, but..."
links.text: "Nothing to *get into* really, but sure, let's focus on the important things." He pats the motor carriage.

links.title: You: ""Sorry about it, I wanted to contac..."
links.text: "Sorry about it, I wanted to contact the dispatch." (Pick up the radio and turn it back to PRIMELINE.)

links.title: You: ""Isn't that the station we have to..."
links.text: "Isn't that the station we have to call? Speedfreaks FM? Why's it saved as 'favourite'?"

links.title: You: ""*Speedfreaks FM*, huh?" (Look him..."
links.text: "*Speedfreaks FM*, huh?" (Look him in the eye.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, is that what it was called?" H..."
links.text: "Oh, is that what it was called?" He's trying hard to act surprised.

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""...AND DE FACTO THE FASTEST MUSIC..."
links.text: "...AND DE FACTO THE FASTEST MUSIC IN ALL OF R-R-REVACHOL R-ROCK CITY. ALL YOU HOOLIGANS, DOWNTOWN DRIFTERS, SIDEWAYS SALLIES AND POWERSLIDING PIERRES...

links.title: DJ Mesh: ""... GET INTO GEAR, DROP THE MOTHER..."
links.text: "... GET INTO GEAR, DROP THE MOTHERFUCKING CLUTCH AND LET THE P-P-PPP-PPPPOWER TAKE YOU ON A JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME!"

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The radio DJ stops. For a moment it..."
links.text: The radio DJ stops. For a moment it seems like he has ran out of things to say...

links.title: Volition: "This radio station is even worse th..."
links.text: This radio station is even worse than Cuno -- it feels like someone defecating right into your ear.

links.title: Volition: "This must be the most annoying thin..."
links.text: This must be the most annoying thing you've ever heard -- it feels like someone defecating right into your ear.

links.title: You: ""I'm done with the radio for now."..."
links.text: "I'm done with the radio for now." (End call.)

links.title: Alice: ""Fifty-seventh, over and out." Her..."
links.text: "Fifty-seventh, over and out." Her voice disappears into the void.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The frequency tableau lights up and..."
links.text: The frequency tableau lights up and a green button labelled PRIMELINE glows like a feline eye... and then you hear something.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The soft purr of electrical kittens..."
links.text: The soft purr of electrical kittens -- radio waves cast far and wide over the metropolis. A woman's voice greets you through the static:

links.title: Alice: ""This is Precinct 57! Hello, lieute..."
links.text: "This is Precinct 57! Hello, lieutenant, how may I assist you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hello, Alice, please assist our co..."
links.text: "Hello, Alice, please assist our colleague from the 41st Precinct here. I'm putting him on."

links.title: Composure: "Operating the radio is easy. Just b..."
links.text: Operating the radio is easy. Just be confident -- you've probably done it a thousand times.

links.title: You: ""Come in, Delta-Ten, this is Firewa..."
links.text: "Come in, Delta-Ten, this is Firewalker, copy."

links.title: You: ""Hi, Alice, this is the officer fro..."
links.text: "Hi, Alice, this is the officer from the 41st Precinct speaking. Nice to meet you."

links.title: You: ""Hello... hello... hello...." (Mimi..."
links.text: "Hello... hello... hello...." (Mimic echo.) "Is there anybody out there?"

links.title: Alice: ""Yes, hello? Who is this?" There's..."
links.text: "Yes, hello? Who is this?" There's a pause. "My records show this channel is used by Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi."

links.title: You: ""Yes, I know Kim! He's my partner.""
links.text: "Yes, I know Kim! He's my partner."

links.title: Alice: ""Oh. Do you have permission to call..."
links.text: "Oh. Do you have permission to call from the lieutenant's vehicle?" Her voice doesn't sound very friendly. "Where is he?"

links.title: You: ""He's resting. It's been rough arou..."
links.text: "He's resting. It's been rough around here. Listen, I need assistance."

links.title: You: ""I don't know, it's not like we're..."
links.text: "I don't know, it's not like we're joined by the hip. Anyway, I need assistance."

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant Harrier Du Bois, report..."
links.text: "Lieutenant Harrier Du Bois, reporting in. I'm on a case with Lieutenant Kitsuragi."

links.title: Alice: ""Affirmative, Lieutenant Du Bois."..."
links.text: "Affirmative, Lieutenant Du Bois." There's a pause, tense with anticipation.

links.title: Alice: ""From the 41st Precinct. Where is L..."
links.text: "From the 41st Precinct. Where is Lieutenant Kitsuragi?"

links.title: You: ""This is... Harry. I guess. Lieuten..."
links.text: "This is... Harry. I guess. Lieutenant Kitsuragi is my partner on a case."

links.title: Alice: ""Mr. Harry, do you have permission..."
links.text: "Mr. Harry, do you have permission to call from the lieutenant's vehicle? Where is he?"

links.title: You: ""I prefer to be called Tequila Suns..."
links.text: "I prefer to be called Tequila Sunset. Kim's my partner. We're solving a case."

links.title: Alice: ""Right... Mr. Sunset." Her voice do..."
links.text: "Right... Mr. Sunset." Her voice does not sound friendly. "Do you have permission to call from the lieutenant's vehicle? Where is he?"

links.title: You: ""Uh, the name's Mr. Costeau. Rapha..."
links.text: "Uh, the name's Mr. Costeau. Raphal to friends. Kim's my friend."

links.title: Alice: ""Mr. Costeau... if that is your rea..."
links.text: "Mr. Costeau... if that is your real name, unauthorized use of a police officer's radio is a *major* crime. I will have to alert my colleagues."

links.title: You: ""No, wait! We're solving a murder c..."
links.text: "No, wait! We're solving a murder case in Martinaise."

links.title: Alice: "Her voice does not sound friendly...."
links.text: Her voice does not sound friendly. "Where is the lieutenant?"

links.title: You: "Hang up quickly."
links.text: Hang up quickly.

links.title: You: ""Operating a radio is easy." (Speak..."
links.text: "Operating a radio is easy." (Speak into the microphone:) "Come in Delta-Ten, this is Firewalker, copy!"

links.title: You: ""Hi, Alice, I'm a policeman too. Ni..."
links.text: "Hi, Alice, I'm a policeman too. Nice to meet you."

links.title: Alice: ""Who is this?" There's a pause. "My..."
links.text: "Who is this?" There's a pause. "My records show this channel is used by Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi."

links.title: You: "Pick up the radio again."
links.text: Pick up the radio again.

links.title: You: "Pull out the pull-out toolbox."
links.text: Pull out the pull-out toolbox.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "A metallic drawer slides out from u..."
links.text: A metallic drawer slides out from under the seat and clicks into place. The tools inside are neatly organized.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Take what you need, officer. It's..."
links.text: "Take what you need, officer. It's going to be a long case. I'm not *protective* of my tools. Like some men are..."

links.title: Empathy: "He's clearly *a little* protective..."
links.text: He's clearly *a little* protective of his tools, but what can you do? Work is work.

links.title: You: "Take the red-tipped prybar."
links.text: Take the red-tipped prybar.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The prybar feels nice and cold in y..."
links.text: The prybar feels nice and cold in your hand. Heavier than you'd think.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Cold and heavy -- like truth. You f..."
links.text: Cold and heavy -- like truth. You feel like you're reunited with *truth* once more.

links.title: Interfacing: "Useful for opening all sorts of doo..."
links.text: Useful for opening all sorts of doors and lids...

links.title: You: "Take the rubber-handled chaincutter..."
links.text: Take the rubber-handled chaincutters.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The handles are long and sleek. *Sn..."
links.text: The handles are long and sleek. *Snap-snap* go the cutters in your hand.

links.title: Interfacing: "You can do good work with these: cu..."
links.text: You can do good work with these: cut chains, locks, and ropes -- especially belts...

links.title: You: "Take the hand-cranked flashlight."
links.text: Take the hand-cranked flashlight.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "It's robust, weatherproof and well..."
links.text: It's robust, weatherproof and well made. Police issue -- blue.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Let's you see things in the dark yo..."
links.text: Let's you see things in the dark you would otherwise miss...

links.title: You: "Push in the pull-out toolbox."
links.text: Push in the pull-out toolbox.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The pull-out toolbox slides back in..."
links.text: The pull-out toolbox slides back into its nest. Pre-heater gauge casts a warm glow on the steering levers and the radio on its hook.

links.title: You: "Run your fingers over one of the st..."
links.text: Run your fingers over one of the steering levers.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The white suede feels luxurious und..."
links.text: The white suede feels luxurious under the touch and the metal clutch handle so very familiar in your palm...

links.title: Interfacing: "Your fingers waste no time closing..."
links.text: Your fingers waste no time closing around the handle. Clutch disengaged. Release the handle -- clutch drops -- right foot yearns for the familiar touch of the accelerator pedal. You have synced with the machine's mechanical circulation.

links.title: You: "Do I know how to operate this machi..."
links.text: Do I know how to operate this machine?

links.title: Interfacing: "You feel an uninterrupted connectio..."
links.text: You feel an uninterrupted connection to the mechanics.

links.title: You: "Wait, does it mean I know how to pi..."
links.text: Wait, does it mean I know how to pilot it?

links.title: Interfacing: "After a while you realize silence i..."
links.text: After a while you realize silence is your only answer. Do what you will with it.

links.title: You: "Release the clutch and squeeze it a..."
links.text: Release the clutch and squeeze it again.

links.title: Interfacing: "Of course it's only in your head --..."
links.text: Of course it's only in your head -- of course it is -- but it almost feels as if the clutch handle is gently squeezing back.

links.title: You: "How are you, my friend?"
links.text: How are you, my friend?

links.title: Interfacing: "The smell of freshly treated leathe..."
links.text: The smell of freshly treated leather, the lack of dirt and dust on the dashboard, and a neat little brush in the cup-holder all seem to be whispering:

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "I'm good, cherished and cared for,..."
links.text: I'm good, cherished and cared for, in the hands of a tending owner.

links.title: You: "Where have you been?"
links.text: Where have you been?

links.title: Interfacing: "At the bottom of the sea..."
links.text: At the bottom of the sea...

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Interfacing: "So strange. The machine is not on t..."
links.text: So strange. The machine is not on the bottom of the sea at all. It's right in front of you, well kept. Why did it say that?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Because it's lonely. Just like you...."
links.text: Because it's lonely. Just like you. Seaweed and strange fish around it, limpets clinging to the carcass... The sounds of the streets above...

links.title: Logic: "This is clearly feverish nonsense -..."
links.text: This is clearly feverish nonsense -- let's rationalize it away. Grab the radio, or tools, or do something normal.

links.title: Inland Empire: "A dark feeling. This is going wrong..."
links.text: A dark feeling. This is going wrong. Let go of the clutch.

links.title: You: "Release the clutch handle."
links.text: Release the clutch handle.

links.title: Interfacing: "The handle is pulled back. Somewher..."
links.text: The handle is pulled back. Somewhere deep inside the drivetrain the disk is mated to the flywheel again.

links.title: You: "Tap on the fuel pre-heater gauge."
links.text: Tap on the fuel pre-heater gauge.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "As you tap on the gauge, the indica..."
links.text: As you tap on the gauge, the indicator pin jerks as if startled. It's in the large orange sector, indicating the engine is warm. Next to the gauge is a red switch labelled HEAT.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's no use pressing the HEAT b..."
links.text: "There's no use pressing the HEAT button," he says and jingles his keys. "It won't start without the ignition key."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Translation: We're not going anywhe..."
links.text: Translation: We're not going anywhere right now.

links.title: Authority: "Alternative translation: Don't even..."
links.text: Alternative translation: Don't even *think* you can drive my MC.

links.title: You: "Press HEAT."
links.text: Press HEAT.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The button stays in the dash for a..."
links.text: The button stays in the dash for a few seconds, then jumps out and... nothing happens.

links.title: Interfacing: "The Coupris Kineema cannot be start..."
links.text: The Coupris Kineema cannot be started without an ignition key.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "As you tap on the gauge, the indica..."
links.text: As you tap on the gauge, the indicator pin jerks as if startled. It's in the small blue sector, indicating the engine is cold. Next to the gauge is a red switch labelled HEAT.

links.title: You: "Tap on the fuel pre-heater gauge."
links.text: Tap on the fuel pre-heater gauge.

links.title: You: ""Kim, what are we looking at? What..."
links.text: "Kim, what are we looking at? What is this machine?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it's my patrol vehicle. You c..."
links.text: "Yes, it's my patrol vehicle. You can use the toolbox and the radio if you'd like." He nods at the cabin.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Motor carriage, motor carriage... S..."
links.text: Motor carriage, motor carriage... Something bad with a motor carriage.... A dark lump rises in your throat.

links.title: You: "What is this sinking feeling I have..."
links.text: What is this sinking feeling I have with the words *motor carriage*?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Nothing. Nothing. It's probably not..."
links.text: Nothing. Nothing. It's probably nothing, forget I brought it up. Please proceed with the carefree lollygagging.

links.title: You: ""Can we turn it on and drive somewh..."
links.text: "Can we turn it on and drive somewhere?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I'm afraid not." He straighten..."
links.text: "No, I'm afraid not." He straightens his spine. "We have a murder case on our hands, remember?"

links.title: You: "(Squint your eyes) "Okay, but what..."
links.text: (Squint your eyes) "Okay, but what *is* a motor carriage?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A motorized vehicle, officer. I'm..."
links.text: "A motorized vehicle, officer. I'm sure you are familiar with the concept. We've had these for nearly a century."

links.title: You: ""This must be what woke me up when..."
links.text: "This must be what woke me up when you arrived in Martinaise. The infernal noise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, sorry about that... the Coupr..."
links.text: "Yes, sorry about that... the Coupris Kineema does have a rather... distinctive engine sound."

links.title: Empathy: "He says it with very badly conceale..."
links.text: He says it with very badly concealed pride.

links.title: You: ""Do all policemen in the RCM have s..."
links.text: "Do all policemen in the RCM have such *cool* motor carriages?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Coupris MotorCorp does provide..."
links.text: "The Coupris MotorCorp does provide most of our patrol vehicles, yes."

links.title: Interfacing: "But this is different -- this is a..."
links.text: But this is different -- this is a sports model.

links.title: You: ""I might be wrong, but this one is..."
links.text: "I might be wrong, but this one is a *sports model*, right?"

links.title: You: "Look around the cabin again."
links.text: Look around the cabin again.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is the Coupris Kineema, my mo..."
links.text: "This is the Coupris Kineema, my motor carriage. You can use the toolbox and the radio if you'd like." He nods at the cabin.

links.title: You: "Close the door. [Leave.]"
links.text: Close the door. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Coupris Kineema: "Before you stands a motor carriage...."
dialogueTree.text: Before you stands a motor carriage. The bodywork is covered in blue and white livery bearing the number 57.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have something in the back we co..."
links.text: "I have something in the back we could sell so you can pay for your room. Open the suspect transport enclosure."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Those are some fancy words. Most pe..."
links.text: Those are some fancy words. Most people would just call it *the cage*.

links.title: You: ""You mean the cage, right?""
links.text: "You mean the cage, right?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He frowns. "I've never liked..."
links.text: "Yes." He frowns. "I've never liked that crude name. It doesn't do much to improve the RCM's reputation."

links.title: You: "Open the door."
links.text: Open the door.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "Vapour emanates from the large engi..."
links.text: Vapour emanates from the large engine on the back of the vehicle. It hasn't had time to cool off yet.

links.title: Logic: "This must be the infernal machine t..."
links.text: This must be the infernal machine that tore you from oblivion -- the Coupris Kineema motor carriage.

links.title: You: "Open the door."
links.text: Open the door.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "In the cabin you are welcomed by a..."
links.text: In the cabin you are welcomed by a set of steering levers, a radio-microphone on a hook, a pull-out toolbox under the seat, and the soft glow of the fuel pre-heater gauge.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "A scent of leather-work and heavy f..."
links.text: A scent of leather-work and heavy fuel oils washes over you.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Logic: "This must be the infernal machine t..."
links.text: This must be the infernal machine that tore you from oblivion.
